bibl.title: From Evagoras I to the Ptolemies: The Transition from the Classical to the Hellenistic Period in Cyprus. Proceedings of the International Archaeological Conference, Nicosia, 29-30 November 2002.
bibl.seg: Flourentzos Pavlos (Ed.), From Evagoras I to the Ptolemies: The Transition from the Classical to the Hellenistic Period in Cyprus. Proceedings of the International Archaeological Conference, Nicosia, 29-30 November 2002.
Nicosia, The Department of Antiquities, Cyprus, 2007. ISBN 978-9963-36-442-8.
